backend/main.mo: Main backend actor handling user profiles, access control, Stripe sessions, and booking-related types with storage mixins and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing replacement of facilitator headshot in PractitionerAuthority using a new uploaded static asset.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of major frontend components including UI sections, admin tools, and integrations.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base layer defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component applying theme, access gate, and composing all landing page sections.
frontend/src/components/AccessCodeGate.t: Client-side access-code gate requiring code 1122 before revealing page content with sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Empty placeholder for admin dashboard component.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityEdit: Empty placeholder for availability editor component.
frontend/src/components/BookingSection.t: Empty placeholder for booking section component.
Empty placeholder for bookings manager component.
frontend/src/components/EthicsAndBoundar: Static content section outlining ethical guidelines, boundaries, and disclaimers for sessions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with maxim statement and small attribution line using gold-accent heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with authority-themed background and CTA button linking to Linktree booking.
frontend/src/components/InviteGate.tsx: Empty placeholder for invite gate component.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Empty placeholder for payment failure screen.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Empty placeholder for payment success screen.
frontend/src/components/PractitionerAuth: Practitioner profile section using new facilitator headshot asset, bio details, and non-clickable social icons.
frontend/src/components/PriceAndValue.ts: Displays pricing for a $177, 75‑minute private session along with notes on value and boundaries.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty file placeholder for a profile setup modal component.
frontend/src/components/SessionStructure: Outlines the four‑step structure of the 75‑minute session: clarity, insight, responsibility, and integration.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Empty file placeholder for a Stripe setup modal component.
frontend/src/components/WhatItIs.tsx: Explains what The Clearing™ is, its reflective tarot‑based approach, and clarifies what it is not.
frontend/src/components/WhatToExpect.tsx: Describes what happens during the session, who benefits most, and who the session is not designed for.
frontend/src/components/WhoThisIsFor.tsx: Defines criteria for who the work is suited for and who it is not, with a concluding readiness note.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, identity loading, and state management via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for user profiles, Stripe setup, checkout sessions, and booking-related backend calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes, and applies base typography and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL or sessionStorage parameters, with support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, fonts, spacing, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s architecture, features, and known issues for the booking and payment DApp, including frontend/backend behavior and Stripe integration.
